text: Kentucky Route 152 (KY 152) is a state highway in Kentucky that runs from KY 49 north of Loretto to U.S. Route 27 (US 27) and Galilee Road north of Bryantsville via Springfield, Mackville, Harrodsburg, and Burgin. ==Major intersections== Marion Co + US 150 Bus. Overlap + Washington County = 46.561 ==References== 0152 Kentucky Route 152 Kentucky Route 152 Kentucky Route 152 Kentucky Route 152
title: Kentucky Route 152
